raw_mentions: These results are consistent with reported IC50 values for simvastatin and lovastatin (4 nmol/L and 19 nmol/L, respectively) (Van Vliet, A K et al., Biochem Pharmacol, 1996, 52:1387-1392).

Because lovastatin has a higher IC50 value for HMG-CoA reductase compared to that of simvastatin, it was 10-fold less potent in upregulating ecNOS protein levels than simvastatin at equimolar concentrations.
